Probably the worst game ive played. maybe if i was good at the game it would be better but im utter shite at the game and every time i play this game it makes me want to kill my self. The amount of money ive spent to cosmetic things in this game is just dumb, maybe im a chronic gambler but hey you win some you lose some. And the amount of times ive been kicked from games is dumb, and yet again you win some you lose some. but other than the fact i want to kill myself every second i play this game i will still come back to it, for the sole reason of being able to Seanedoff my mates in the back of their cranium/   Overall cant complain about the game 
My score 10/10
